creator: jinp@erols.com
text:
have "Communication Error" when trying to access
http://sourceforge.net/projects/gkernel, also when trying to do the search at
http://www.google.com when using netscape 4.78 through the proxy of apache
1.3.24, version 2.0.32 is ok, also using mozilla is ok on both version, I am on
redhat 7.2 with proxy server and browser on the same machine, and most sites are
ok.

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
Could you please try with version 1.3.26 and reopent this report if the problem
persists.  Thanks!

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
No further response. Assuming issue resolved.

Please reopen the bug if this is not the case and you can provide the requested
information.

Thanks for using Apache.
